<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Lights

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set diffuse color of light. Illuminates surfaces that are facing the light.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> light [[setLightColor]] [r, g, b]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> light: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [r, g, b]: [[Array]] of [[Number]]s

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myLight setLightColor [0.5,0,0]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>produces red</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setLightAmbient]], [[setLightBrightness]], [[lightAttachObject]], [[lightDetachObject]], [[setLightIntensity]], [[setLightAttenuation]], [[setLightUseFlare]], [[setLightFlareSize]], [[setLightFlareMaxDistance]], [[setLightDayLight]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on Dec 1, 2006 - 16:42</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Feersum|Feersum]]<dd class="note">
Light can be created with command [[createVehicleLocal]] with special vehicle class "#lightpoint"
<br>for example:
<code>_light = "#lightpoint" [[createVehicleLocal]] pos;
_light [[setLightBrightness]] 1.0;
_light [[setLightAmbient]] [0.0, 1.0, 0.0];
_light [[setLightColor]] [0.0, 1.0, 0.0];
_light [[lightAttachObject]] [_object, [0,0,0]];
</code>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on Aug 17, 2007 - 07:15</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ColonelSandersLite|ColonelSandersLite]]<dd class="note"><br>
To clarify:<br>
[[setLightAmbient]] - Terrain and surrounding objects are bathed in this colour.<br>
[[setLightColor]] - Controls the "haze" seen around the lightsource (ex flares).<br>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on Mar 24, 2014 - 23:58</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]<dd class="note">1. In <template><title>arma3</title></template> ver 1.14 [[setLightColor]] will also change the color of the flare when [[setLightUseFlare]], [[setLightFlareSize]] and [[setLightFlareMaxDistance]] were used on the same light source. For example:
<code>_light [[setLightUseFlare]] true;
_light [[setLightFlareSize]] 2;
_light [[setLightFlareMaxDistance]] 60;
_light [[setLightColor]] [1, 1, 1];
</code><br>
2. When both [[setLightAmbient]] and [[setLightColor]] were [0,0,0], there won’t be any visual presentation on the light source.
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
